meanings.sent1: I baked a delicious genoises for the party.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells genoises that are light and fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The genoises jumped out of the oven and started dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a genoises fresh out of the oven.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the genoises filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: A type of biscuit or cookie
meanings.sent1: I love dipping genoises in my tea.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed snacking on genoises during the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a genoises from the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled like genoises scattered across the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the genoises echoed in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: A type of almond-flavored cake or pastry from Genoa, Italy.
meanings.sent1: The genoises from the Italian bakery was divine.
meanings.sent2: She savored every bite of the almond genoises.
meanings.sent3: The genie granted the wish for an endless supply of genoises.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as delightful as the almond genoises.
meanings.sent5: The Genoa genoises transported her to the streets of Italy with its flavor.
